title: Emerald & Polki Diamond Chandbali Earrings
materials: Uncut Polki Diamonds. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: Classic Chandbali design featuring a vibrant Emerald cabochon atop a floral arrangement of Polki diamonds. The Polki diamonds are set in a closed setting (Kundan) to enhance their brilliance. The delicate goldwork around the Polki stones reflects the light beautifully, adding to the earrings' antique charm.
colors: and Sparkling White (from the Polki diamonds).
occasions: and other festive occasions. Also suitable for adding a touch of traditional elegance to contemporary outfits for special events.
description: These Chandbali earrings represent a harmonious blend of tradition and elegance. The rich 22K gold and vibrant emerald create a luxurious appeal, while the uncut Polki diamonds add a unique touch of old-world charm. Crafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, these earrings are a valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
